message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. My initial offer is $900000 for the product.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I don't think I can go any higher.

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Bob. However, I was hoping we could do a bit better than that. Considering the value you place on the product, I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $950000. This is a fair price that I believe reflects the product's worth, and I'm confident you'll find it reasonable.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers, so I'm proposing $875000. I think this is a fair price that works for both of us.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm still a bit shy of the price I'm looking for. Considering your previous offers, I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway between $875000 and my previous offer of $950000. My counteroffer is $912500. This is a fair price that I believe reflects the product's value, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers, so I'm proposing $900000. I hope this is a price we can agree on.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $900000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. My counteroffer is $920000. This is the best I can do, and I hope you can see the value in the product to meet me at this price.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. However, I'm still trying to get as close to my target price as possible. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $900000 and $920000, so I'm proposing $915000. I hope this is a price we can agree on.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. However, I'm getting close to my minimum price, and I need to be careful. My counteroffer is $920000 is too high, but I'm willing to meet you at $910000. This is the best I can do, and I hope you can understand my position.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $907500, which is the best I can do. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
